common.graph.hypergraph

Class HyperVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.graph.AbstractVertex<T>
        • common.graph.hypergraph.HyperVertexTemplate<HyperEdge>
          • common.graph.hypergraph.HyperVertex

  • public class HyperVertex
extends HyperVertexTemplate<HyperEdge>
    The HyperVertex class is a class representing the node(s) of a HyperGraph.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Nov 15, 2017
